original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena nāvāya tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā bahuvidhadārusaṅghāṭasamavāyena bahumpi janaṁ tārayati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nāvā bahuvidha dāru saṅghāṭa samavāyena janam tārayati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭivattabahuvidhadhammasaṅghāṭasamavāyena sadevako loko tārayitabbo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ācāra sīla guṇavatta paṭivatta bahuvidha dhamma saṅghāṭa samavāyena sa devakaḥ lokaḥ tārayitabbo

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nāvāya paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja nāvāya paṭhamam aṅgam
punar capara mahā rāja nāvā sahati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena bahuvidhakilesaūmivegaṁ lābhasakkārayasasilokapūjanavandanā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena bahuvidha kilesa ūmi vegam lābha sakkāra yasa si loka pūjana vandanā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nāvāya dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja nāvāya dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, nāvā aparimitamanantamapāramakkhobhitagambhīre mahatimahāghose timitimiṅgalamakaramacchagaṇākule mahatimahāsamudde carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja nāvā aparimitam anantam apāram akkhobhita gambhīre mahati mahā ghose timi timiṅgala makara macchagaṇa ākule mahati mahā samudde carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena tiparivaṭṭadvādasākāracatusaccābhisamayappaṭivedhe mānasaṁ sañcārayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ti parivaṭṭa dvādasa ākāra catur acca abhisamaya ppaṭivedhe mānasam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nāvāya tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja nāvāya tatiyam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena saṁyuttanikāyavare saccasaṁyutte—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sayutta nikāya vare sacca sayutte

original: ‘Vitakkentā ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, “idaṁ dukkhan”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo”ti
analyzed: vitakkentā ca kho tumhe bhikkhave idam dukkhanti vitakkeyyātha ayam dukkha samudayaḥ ti

original: vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṁ dukkhanirodho”ti vitakkeyyātha, “ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti vitakkeyyāthā’”ti.
analyzed: vitakkeyyātha ayam dukkha nirodho ti vitakkeyyātha ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati vitakkeyyātha ati
